text: Samanda (Amanda Louise Marchant and Samantha Joanne Marchant), born 26 June 1988, were a British female duet and identical twins. They formed in the UK in 2007 after exiting Big Brother in 2nd place behind Brian Belo. Their first single is a cover of "Barbie Girl". which charted at 26 in the United Kingdom and 45 in the Republic of Ireland. They also had a top 200 hit with "Honey Love". They are part of the Sony BMG record label. ==Singles== Year Single Chart positions UK 2007 "Barbie Girl" 26 2008 "Honey Love" 125 2010 "Whistle For A Hottie" TBR ==References== Category:1988 births Category:2000s British music groups Category:2007 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:2010 disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:Big Brother contestants Category:British girl groups Category:British television personalities Category:English models Category:English pop music groups Category:Living people Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2010 Category:Musical groups established in 2007 Category:People from Staffordshire Category:Sibling musical duos Category:Twin people from England
title: Samanda
